title: Ed Helms
description: Samantha Bee sits down with actor Ed Helms to discuss their formative years on The Daily Show, his new show True Story, the importance of diverse writing rooms, and why it's important to laugh at yourself.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee & Earwolf)
